application.doc: Querying the First Steps Setup status

method.name: GET
method.doc: This API can be used to check if the First Steps Setup process has already been completed.
If the First Steps Setup is not completed, see the topic "Completing the First Steps Setup" for further instructions.

param.name: configured
param.doc: Has the First Steps Setup process been completed?

response.doc: If the service agreement has not yet been accepted, this API will return a redirect to the Service Agreements endpoint.
